content: googly-eyed octopus finger puppet googly-eyed octopus finger puppet ©2015 primarily patterns 1 abbreviations us notation materials & tools chain = chain 16 yds worsted decrease = decrease 3 5 mm e crochet hook increase = increase 1 pair 12mm sew-on wiggle eyes lp = loop needle and thread to attach eyes magic_ring = magic_ring magic loop nxt = next single_crochet = single_crochet skip = skip slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch #x = repeat contents of brackets # times notes ● worked in the round do not join rounds ● total stitches worked in the round or row are given in parentheses ● finished size 1 75 tall with 3 tentacles ● additional tips and tutorials can be found at http //primarilypatterns blogspot com/ round 1 5 single_crochet in magic_ring 5 round 2 increase in each st around 10 round 3 single_crochet increase 5x 15 round 4 2 single_crochet increase 5x 20 rounds 5-6 single_crochet in each st around 20 round 7 3 single_crochet decrease 4x 16 rounds 8-9 single_crochet in each st around 16 round 10 chain 16 single_crochet in 2nd st from hook single_crochet in nxt 9 chain sts half_double_crochet in nxt 5 chain sts skip 1 st in round 9 slip_stitch in outer lp of nxt st 8x decrease in 1st skipped st and 1st unused inner lp 8 legs round 11 working in skipped sts and unused inner lps single_crochet decrease 5x adjust number of decreases as needed to get a opening just snug enough the octopus won t easily fall off finger 15 sew eyes to body between rounds 5 and 6 with centers approximately 1 25 apart googly-eyed octopus finger puppet ©2015 primarily patterns 2
